ingredients: 10 ounce package white button mushrooms, wiped clean, stems trimmed and sliced
10 ounce package baby bella mushrooms, wiped clean, stems trimmed and sliced
3 – 4 sprigs fresh thyme, bundled and tied (keep a bit of fresh leaves aside for garnish if you’d like)
1 small baguette, sliced and toasted (day old bread is best)
